name: Nomad of the Storm
description:
My submission to the Godot Wild Game Jam.

Nomad of the Storm is an FPS where you must stay in a fast moving safe zone while fighting off ghosts. The zone moves around a large map, and you must Bunnyhop (strafe and jump) in order to catch up to it. Ammo and medkits are found all around the map.

Known Issues:

Weapons will turn upside down sometimes (weird, right?)

Controls:

WASD to move

Left-click to fire

mouse to aim

2 and 4 to switch weapons

Tab to use medkits

Space to jump

Music by Dekkanoid#0660 on Discord
